ygData.subject: Re: Beggining Necromancer
ygData.msgSnippet: I have 3 buttons setup that I use regularly.  pet attack pet stand up and pet follow me about the only one that needs explanation is the stand up this
ygData.messageBody:
I have 3 buttons setup that I use regularly. "pet attack" "pet stand up"
and "pet follow me" about the only one that needs explanation is the "stand
up" this command will make your pet stand in the same place, rather than
follow you all over the dungeon/zone. I've found that a good strategy
(while soloing) is to have your pet stay in one place and train things back
to it, using clinging/engulfing darkness to slow the mob down while pulling
it.

----- Original Message -----
From: Hunter Rose <grendel@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 1:24 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Beggining Necromancer


> From: Hunter Rose <grendel@...>
>
> I am planning on starting a Necromancer today and I have had no
> experience using pets. I was wondering what hot buttons I should
> configure in terms of Pet Commands and how and when I should use them in
>
> order to use them effectively? I also plan on grouping regularly
> (unfortunately, mostly with good races) and I was wondering if this has
> any impact on my pet and how? Any tips you would be willing to give a
> young first time DE Necromancer on BB would be appreciated.
>
>
